#summary Guest requests larger/smaller room or just shuffling guests around prior to checkin in order to keep groups together.

== Process ==

  # Click Bookings.
  # Enter name/reservation number and set date to start date of booking. Click Search.
  # Find reservation. Click Edit.
  # For the allocation to move, click Edit.
  # Change the room assigned to either a specific room number or a particular group. Click ok. (If a group was assigned, a new bed will be assigned within the group or message will be displayed if no availability)
  # Click save (error message will be displayed if no availability for the given rooms/dates).
